title: 820-4924 laggy when using Saferi application,
message:
The unit was liquid damaged. had corrosion on the LCD connector area and battery circuit which I've fixed a while ago. If I go to websites like eBay, youtube, Facebook. the user input field box makes the MacBook lag, much like throttling. almost 5-second pause delay. i also had the battery replaced which i bought from aliexpress. it looks genuine. [IMG type="full" width="200px"]https://i.imgur.com/UjEEwJL.png[/IMG]
 



websites browsing temperatures status : [IMG type="full" width="200px"]https://i.imgur.com/DPMWKIy.png[/IMG]
    [IMG type="full" width="200px"]https://i.imgur.com/AtuZ4RQ.png[/IMG]
 







so I need to use Mac fan control to keep the temp cool. but it still lags when browsing websites.
ASD passed all the test. Fan and thermalpaste are good.
I live in UK, all weather season still make the laptop lag.
it has macOS High Sierra loaded.

title: 820-4924 laggy when using Saferi application,
message:
70C is fine on CPU die. 

Does internal diagnostics report anything, hold down D while powering on.

title: 820-4924 laggy when using Saferi application,
message: nothing to report on internal diagnostics. I'll downgrade to regular macoS sierra to see if will fix it.
